naslov: Žrnovnica, novouređena kuća s uređenom okućnicom (prodaja)
opis: Prostrana kuća s uređenom okućnicom – mir i priroda u blizini Splita U zelenilom okruženoj Žrnovnici, na samo nekoliko minuta vožnje od Splita i obale, nalazi se ova potpuno renovirana kuća s prostranom parcelom. Smještena u mirnoj ulici s pogledom na okolna brda, kuća je idealna za obiteljski život ili ulaganje u turizam. Žrnovnica je naselje koje uspješno spaja autentičnost dalmatinskog zaleđa s blizinom mora i svih sadržaja grada. Poznata po netaknutoj prirodi, planinskim stazama, rijeci koja prolazi kroz samo mjesto te gostoljubivosti lokalnog stanovništva, Žrnovnica postaje sve poželjnije mjesto za život i odmor. Opis nekretnine Kuća tlocrtne površine 85 m² nalazi se na zemljištu od ukupno 506 m², a prostire se kroz tri etaže: prizemlje, prvi kat i potkrovlje. • Prizemlje: komforan dvosoban stan s dnevnim boravkom, kuhinjom, kupaonicom i dvije spavaće sobe. Na istoj etaži nalaze se i dodatne prostorije – konoba, ostava i alatnica. • Prvi kat: također potpuno novouređeni dvosoban stan s identičnim rasporedom prostorija. • Potkrovlje: trenutno povezano s prvim katom, ali se jednostavno može pretvoriti u zasebnu jedinicu. Na okućnici se nalaze kamin s prostorom za druženje, mali vrt te parkiralište za desetak automobila. Dodatne informacije • Kuća je legalizirana • Prodaje se isključivo za gotovinu • Udaljenost od mora i plaže: 3 km • Udaljenost od centra Splita: 10 km • U blizini su trgovine, škola, autobusna stanica, šetnice i ostali sadržaji Cijena i uvjeti • Cijena: 750.000,00 € • Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju u iznosu od 3% + PDV Za dodatne informacije i organizaciju razgledavanja: Tonka Tomić Telefon: +385 91 534 9959 E-mail: t.tomic@remax.hr Razgledavanje i točna lokacija nekretnine dostupni su nakon potpisivanja Ugovora o posredovanju s Agencijom, sukladno Zakonu o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. ________________________________________ Spacious house with landscaped garden - peace and nature near Split In the greenery of Žrnovnica, just a few minutes' drive from Split and the coast, there is this completely renovated house with a spacious plot. Located in a quiet street with a view of the surrounding hills, the house is ideal for family life or an investment in tourism. Žrnovnica is a village that successfully combines the authenticity of the Dalmatian hinterland with proximity to the sea and all the amenities of the city. Known for its untouched nature, mountain trails, the river that runs through the town itself, and the hospitality of the local population, Žrnovnica is becoming an increasingly desirable place to live and vacation. Property description The house with a floor area of 85 m² is located on a plot of land of a total of 506 m², and extends over three floors: ground floor, first floor and attic. • Ground floor: comfortable two-room apartment with a living room, kitchen, bathroom and two bedrooms. On the same floor there are also additional rooms - a tavern, pantry and tool room. • First floor: also a completely newly renovated two-bedroom apartment with an identical layout. • Attic: currently connected to the first floor, but can easily be converted into a separate unit. The yard has a fireplace with a seating area, a small garden, and parking for about a dozen cars. Additional information • The house is legalized • It is sold exclusively for cash • Distance from the sea and beach: 3 km • Distance from the center of Split: 10 km • Nearby are shops, schools, bus station, promenades and other amenities Price and conditions • Price: €750,000.00 • The buyer pays an agency fee of 3% + VAT For additional information and organization of a viewing: Tonka Tomić Phone: +385 91 534 9959 E-mail: t.tomic@remax.hr A viewing and the exact location of the property are available after signing the Agency Agreement with the Agency, in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act.
